result.name: broads-site-specific-polygons
result.notes:
This dataset depicts the polygon boundary of each Site Specific Policy adopted by the Broads Authority on 11/07/14. It should be used in conjunction with the Site Specific Lines and Points datasets and the Adopted Broads Sites Specifics Local Plan. 

The definitive maps including constraints (correct as at 19/02/14) are available to view as PDF documents on the Broads Authority website . The Broads Authority does not accept any liability or responsibility for decisions, and matters arising from decisions, made based upon the provided data.

This data is licensed for non commercial, personal use under the OS INSPIRE End User Licence. By viewing or downloading this data you are agreeing to the terms of this licence. If this does not meet your requirement please contact the Broads Authority using the details below.

organization.name: broads-authority
organization.title: Broads Authority
organization.description:
The Broads Authority is a statutory body with duty to manage the Broads for the purposes of:

(a) conserving and enhancing the natural beauty, wildlife and cultural heritage of the Broads;
(b) promoting opportunities for the understanding and enjoyment of the special qualities of the Broads by the public; and
(c) protecting the interests of navigation.

result.title: Broads Site Specific Polygons
